name: ORD_ADJ_END_DATE_ACTIONS
description: Order end date adjustment action details. Includes information regarding automatic end date adjustments and user actions.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADJ_ENDDT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the automatic end date adjustment action state.

columns.name: ADJ_ENDDT_INST_ADD_DTTM
columns.description: The instant this row was generated.

columns.name: ADJ_ENDDT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ADJ_ENDDT_ACT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the user took action.
